CGS-CIMB lowers ST Engineering target price on higher interest ratesCGS-CIMB has cut its target price on ST Engineering (STE) from S$4.53 to S$3.95 after the US Federal Reserve raised its key interest rate by 0.75 per cent on Sep 21  with further hikes expected in the near term.
